channel.title: How to add xp

item.title: How to add xp
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

			else if(itemUsed == 15338 && useWith == 15331) {
                            addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[12]), 12);
			pEmote = 888; //<<------------ CHANGE THE EMOTE NUMBER
			deleteItem(15338, getItemSlot(15338), 1);
			deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
			addItem(15334, 1);
			sendMessage("You succesfully made your own Bandos Godsword");
			}
